tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE budget_variances (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    actual_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    budgeted_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE budget_variances (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  budget_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  actual_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  variance DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE BudgetActualAmounts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  budget_amount DECIMAL,
  actual_amount DECIMAL,
  variance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetItems (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  budget_amount DECIMAL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetVisualizations (
  visualization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visualization_name VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetCategories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50),
  budget_amount DECIMAL,
  actual_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetActuals (
  budget_id INT,
  actual_amount INT
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetExpenses (
  budget_id INT,
  expense_type VARCHAR(50),
  budget_amount INT
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetCategories (
  category_id INT,
  category_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetMetrics (
  metric_id INT,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  actual_amount INT,
  budget_amount INT
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetVariances (
  variance_id INT,
  metric_id INT,
  variance_amount INT
)
